Allen.Radha Krishna Temple, Dallas: Radha Krishna Temple (RKT) of Dallas is a Hindu temple located in Allen, Dallas, United States. RKT was established by JKYog, under the leadership of Swami Mukundananda, a senior disciple of Jagadguru Shri Kripalu Ji Maharaj. The foundation stone of the temple was laid on 22 March 2014, and the first phase of temple construction was completed in July 2017.
